model_cooldown.description: The model load cooldown is still active. You can only change model once every 2 seconds.
model_cooldown.title: Too Fast!

scan.description: This feature is not available on the web version, please use the app version instead.
scan.title: Feature not Available

settings.endpoint: The websocket endpoint for VTube Studio, starting with ${ code("ws://") } or ${ code("wss://") }, for more information please refer to ${ vts_doc("VTube Studio document") }.

update.description: A new version of the app is available, please reload to take effect.
update.title: Update Available

ws.description: This site is accessed via HTTPS, ${ code("ws://") } connection will not work due to browser security policy.

suggestions.portForwarding: Use port forwarding so the connection can be treated as a local connection.
suggestions.proxy: Use a secure proxy server to connect to VTube Studio.
suggestions.title: You may:

ws.title: Connect WS from HTTPS

connect.authenticate: Click allow plugin in VTube Studio on your pc.

endpoint.desciption: Enter the VTube Studio endpoint to connect.
endpoint.manual: ${ bold("Find endpoint manually:") } the endpoint address is usually ${ code("ws://{YOUR_PC_IP}:8001") }, ${ local_ip("learn how to find your pc ip") }.
endpoint.scan: ${ bold("Use built-in scanner:") } click ${ scan_button() } and search for endpoint automatically.
endpoint.wss: ${ bold("Precaution:") } web version of the app will not able to connect VTube Studio via ${ code("ws://") } protocol.

connect.network: Ensure both of your devices are connecting to the same network, ex: connect to same WiFi.
connect.title: How to connect VTube Studio

customize.done: Tap ${ ok_button() } to exit edit mode or show hidden items.
customize.edit_mode: Long press to enter edit mode.
customize.hide: Tap ${ hide_button() } to hide an item.
customize.title: How to customize

data_collection.description: This app does not collect anything from you.
data_collection.title: Data Collection

data_sharing.description: This app does not share anything from you.
data_sharing.title: Data Sharing

data_usage.description: This app does not use anything from you.
data_usage.title: Data Usage

disconnected.description: Please check your settings and the network connectivity.
disconnected.title: Unable to connect VTube Studio

unauthenticated.description: Please allow the Remote VTS Plugin on your VTube Studio
unauthenticated.title: Plugin not Authenticated
